# Holy Avenger
## Overview
**Aura** strong abjuration; **CL** 18th

**Slot** none

**Price** 120,630 gp

**Weight** 4 lbs.

**Description**

This *+2 cold iron longsword* becomes a *+5 [[Holy (MagWpnSpcAb)|holy]] cold iron longsword* in the hands of a [[Paladin|paladin]].

This sacred weapon provides spell resistance of 5 + the paladinâ€™s level to the wielder and anyone adjacent to her. It also enables the [[Paladin|paladin]] to use *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]* (once per round as a standard action) at the class level of the [[Paladin|paladin]]. Only the area dispel is possible, not the targeted dispel or counterspell versions of *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]*.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Holy Aura (Spell)|holy aura]]*, creator must be good

**Cost** 60,630 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 473
